#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define eps 1e-9
#define sd(x) scanf("%d", &x)
#define slf(x) scanf("%lf", &x)
using namespace std;
 
double val[100005], weight[100005], temp[100005]; 
 
int main()
{
	int t, n, m;
	sd(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sd(n);
		sd(m);
		for(int i = 0; i<n; i++)
		{
			slf(val[i]);
			slf(weight[i]);
		}
		double l = 0.0, r = 1e10, mid, sum;
		for(int i = 0; i<70; i++)
		{
			mid = (l+r)/2.0;
			for(int j = 0; j<n; j++)	temp[j] = val[j] - (mid*weight[j]);
			sort(temp, temp+n);
			sum = 0.0;
			for(int j = n-1; j>=(n-m); j--)	sum +=temp[j];
 
			if(sum>=0.0)	l = mid;
			else	r = mid;
		}
		printf("%.9lf\n", l);
	}
}
